primary_contest.tagline: A 2 Day programming contest purely in mathematical domain.

track.name: Mathematics
track.descriptions: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.

primary_contest.description:
Welcome to Ad Infinitum (To Infinity) a programming competition, purely in the mathematics domain.

Contributers

  • Kevin Charles Atienza
  • Shang-En Huang
  • Alexander Vints
  • Vitaly Demidenko
  • Shani Singh
  • Abhra
  • Devendra
  • Akash Agarwall
  • Amit Pandey
Tie breaking/ Penalty will be Submit Time of last challenge - view time of first challenge, allowing you to start late. But once started finish soon :) You can code in the 20+ languages as mentioned here: HackerRank Environment

To Infinity and Beyond
primary_contest.name: Ad Infinitum 8 - Math Programming Contest

model.preview: Find the sum of ( a_i + a_j ) / (a_i * a_j)
model.name: Pairwise Sum and Divide
